decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game through disruption and removal spells, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Ketramose, the New Dawn and Abhorrent Oculus to close out the game. The deck also includes draw spells and graveyard recursion to maintain card advantage and resilience. By combining efficient removal, counter spells, and strong creatures, this deck aims to outlast and overwhelm opponents in a long game, taking advantage of its control elements to dictate the pace of the match.

The deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with different abilities to create powerful synergies and combos. It utilizes cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Dredger's Insight to generate value and card advantage, while using Chord of Calling to tutor for key creatures. The toolbox approach allows for flexibility in adapting to different situations and opponents. The deck also includes cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Young Wolf to provide resilience and board presence. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue opponents through a combination of creature interactions and combo potential.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Breach combo engine to repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard, generating infinite loops or powerful synergies. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide card advantage and recursion, while cards like Underworld Breach and Mishra's Bauble enable the combo pieces to come together quickly. Grinding Station and Malevolent Rumble can then be used to finish off the opponent by milling their deck or dealing damage. The deck aims to be fast and consistent, with the potential for explosive turns and game-winning plays.

The main focus of this Merfolk aggro deck is to quickly ramp up creature presence on the board and overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of attackers. By utilizing cards like Aether Vial and Lord of Atlantis to provide buffs to Merfolk creatures, as well as disruption spells like Force of Negation and Sink into Stupor to control the opponent's plays, this deck aims to maintain a strong tempo and dominate the battlefield. With a mix of creature support, control elements, and tribal synergy, this deck is designed for aggressive and efficient gameplay.

This deck focuses on creating a loop of sacrificing creatures and bringing them back from the graveyard to generate value and eventually close out the game with a mass sacrifice effect. It utilizes cards like Bloodghast, Gravecrawler, and Stitcher's Supplier to fuel the graveyard, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Marionette Apprentice deal damage to the opponent based on the number of sacrificed creatures. The deck aims to assemble the combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful finish.
